trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The serpentmaw can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The serpentmaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the serpentmaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The serpentmaw makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) piercing damage if the serpentmaw had advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.
